Translations.Text: Eteke si bisbasa karaa na'i arau chalato adaya karaa na'i
Baram si satya pratyakhyana karaichila arau mukha ghuraa'i laichila
Tara pichata si ahankara karai nija paraiyalara ocaralai ubhati gaichila
akau durbhoga tomara babe arau durbhoga
manuhe bharae neki ye, taka ene'i erai diya ha’ba
si biryara sukrabindu nachilane, yito skhalita haya
tara pichata se'ito ‘alakbata’ parainata haya. Tara pichata allahe taka srsti karae arau suthama karae
Tara pichata te'om tara paraa yora yora hicape nara-narai srsti karae
Tathapi'o se'i srasta mrtaka punarjiraita karaibalai saksama nahayane barau
